Articles.Content:
As my title goes, hello everyone.

I just realize I did not properly introduce myself to the ksp community. I have forget how a forum is supposed to work ! Please forgive me !

I'm NiKoLas, from France, playing KSP from 1~ year. Mostly designing, playing with MechJeb and slacking around with SSTO.

(my english grammar is bad. I know. Kinda working on it. )

I started with the demo, then a hacked version (I was a little bersterd back in the days ) because I never buy a game without super testing it... I was so hooked that I eventually bought the game.

I'm kinda proud to say it's the last game a bought since !

I promise I will try my best to avoid spamming (already did upps) and to give my best to help the community.

For my fellow rocket science (huehuehuehuehue'science'huehuehuehuehue) engineer, I would tell only this: thanks to let me lurk your design, you are awesome.

Looking forward to reading you,

NKL.

Edited March 20, 2014 by NKL

As someone said to me in my introduction(at least what I remember):

Welcome! Don't be shy, we don't bite!

I am also "working" on my English but I couldn't see any relevant grammar error.(Btw,someone said this to me in my introduction too.)
Welcome aboard! We're all glad to have you.

Hello everybody!I am new on KSP forum community.I want to familiar with this forum and want to share some of my experience with the members of this forum and visitor.I don,t know anything about this forum please help me.Thanks..

Hello everybody!I am new on KSP forum community.I want to familiar with this forum and want to share some of my experience with the members of this forum and visitor.I don,t know anything about this forum please help me.Thanks..

Welcome to the forums and enjoy your stay! And Audrey, I'm also new to the forums myself! But you can ask me if you need help about the forums!
